and

pm∗⁢(∑j=1m∗pjτj+tj)<pm∗τm∗+tm∗⁢(S+∑j=1m∗pj).subscript𝑝superscript𝑚superscriptsubscript𝑗1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗subscript𝜏𝑗subscript𝑡𝑗subscript𝑝superscript𝑚subscript𝜏superscript𝑚subscript𝑡superscript𝑚𝑆superscriptsubscript𝑗1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗p_{m^{*}}\left(\sum_{j=1}^{m^{*}}\frac{p_{j}}{\tau_{j}+t_{j}}\right)<\frac{p_{% m^{*}}}{\tau_{m^{*}}+t_{m^{*}}}\left(S+\sum_{j=1}^{m^{*}}p_{j}\right).italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) < divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_S + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

From the last inequality, we get that τm∗+tm∗<t⁢(m∗)subscript𝜏superscript𝑚subscript𝑡superscript𝑚𝑡superscript𝑚\tau_{m^{*}}+t_{m^{*}}<t(m^{*})italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < italic_t ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ), thus bi≥bm∗>0subscript𝑏𝑖subscript𝑏superscript𝑚0b_{i}\geq b_{m^{*}}>0italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > 0 for all i≤m∗𝑖superscript𝑚i\leq m^{*}italic_i ≤ italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

It remains to find the time complexity with these choices of Bisubscript𝐵𝑖B_{i}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. From Lemma G.3, we have that the time complexity is

T𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)≥maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}⁢max⁡{1,σ2ε⁢B}⁢8⁢Δ⁢Lε.subscript𝑇𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖1superscript𝜎2𝜀𝐵8Δ𝐿𝜀T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}MindFlayerSGD}}}(t)\geq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{% i}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\max\left\{1,\frac{\sigma^{2}}{\varepsilon B}% \right\}\frac{8\Delta L}{\varepsilon}.italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_MindFlayerSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε italic_B end_ARG } divide start_ARG 8 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG .

Then,

maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}≤maxi∈[n]⁡{(bi+1)⁢(τi+ti)}=t⁢(m∗).subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝑏𝑖1subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖𝑡superscript𝑚\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{\left(b_% {i}+1\right)\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}=t(m^{*}).roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } ≤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { ( italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 ) ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = italic_t ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

On the other hand

B𝐵\displaystyle Bitalic_B =\displaystyle== ∑i=1npi⁢Bi≥∑i=1npi⁢bi=∑i=1m∗t⁢(m∗)⁢piτi+ti−∑i=1m∗pisuperscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑏𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1superscript𝑚𝑡superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑖\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n}p_{i}B_{i}\geq\sum_{i=1}^{n}p_{i}b_{i}=\sum_{i=1}^{% m^{*}}t(m^{*})\frac{p_{i}}{\tau_{i}+t_{i}}-\sum_{i=1}^{m^{*}}p_{i}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== (∑j=1m∗pjτj+tj)−1⁢(S+∑j=1m∗pj)⁢∑i=1m∗piτi+ti−∑i=1m∗pi=S≥σ2ε.superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑗1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗subscript𝜏𝑗subscript𝑡𝑗1𝑆superscriptsubscript𝑗1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗superscriptsubscript𝑖1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1superscript𝑚subscript𝑝𝑖𝑆superscript𝜎2𝜀\displaystyle\left(\sum_{j=1}^{m^{*}}\frac{p_{j}}{\tau_{j}+t_{j}}\right)^{-1}% \left(S+\sum_{j=1}^{m^{*}}p_{j}\right)\sum_{i=1}^{m^{*}}\frac{p_{i}}{\tau_{i}+% t_{i}}-\sum_{i=1}^{m^{*}}p_{i}=S\geq\frac{\sigma^{2}}{\varepsilon}.( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_S + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_S ≥ divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG .

Therefore, the time complexity is

T𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)subscript𝑇𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡\displaystyle T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[% named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}MindFlayerSGD}}}(t)italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_MindFlayerSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥\displaystyle\geq≥ t⁢(m∗)⁢8⁢Δ⁢Lε𝑡superscript𝑚8Δ𝐿𝜀\displaystyle t(m^{*})\frac{8\Delta L}{\varepsilon}italic_t ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) divide start_ARG 8 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG
=\displaystyle== minm∈[n]⁡{(∑j=1mpjτj+tj)−1⁢(S+∑j=1mpj)}⁢8⁢Δ⁢Lε.subscript𝑚delimited-[]𝑛superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑗1𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗subscript𝜏𝑗subscript𝑡𝑗1𝑆superscriptsubscript𝑗1𝑚subscript𝑝𝑗8Δ𝐿𝜀\displaystyle\min_{m\in[n]}\left\{\left(\sum_{j=1}^{m}\frac{p_{j}}{\tau_{j}+t_% {j}}\right)^{-1}\left(S+\sum_{j=1}^{m}p_{j}\right)\right\}\frac{8\Delta L}{% \varepsilon}.roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_S + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } divide start_ARG 8 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG .

∎

G.2.1 Proof of Lemma G.3

Lemma G.3.

Assume that Assumptions 4.1, 4.2 and 4.3 hold. Let B=∑i=1npi⁢Bi𝐵superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖B=\sum_{i=1}^{n}p_{i}B_{i}italic_B = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and γ=12⁢L⁢min⁡{1,ε⁢Bσ2}𝛾12𝐿1𝜀𝐵superscript𝜎2\gamma=\frac{1}{2L}\min\left\{1,\frac{\varepsilon B}{\sigma^{2}}\right\}italic_γ = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG roman_min { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_ε italic_B end_ARG start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG } in Method 7. Then after

T𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)≥maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}⁢max⁡{1,σ2ε⁢B}⁢8⁢L⁢(f⁢(x0)−finf)εsubscript𝑇𝖬𝗂𝗇𝖽𝖥𝗅𝖺𝗒𝖾𝗋𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖1superscript𝜎2𝜀𝐵8𝐿𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum𝜀T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}MindFlayerSGD}}}(t)\geq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{% i}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\max\left\{1,\frac{\sigma^{2}}{\varepsilon B}% \right\}\frac{8L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}\right)}{\varepsilon}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_MindFlayerSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε italic_B end_ARG } divide start_ARG 8 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG

seconds, the method guarantees to find an ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ-stationary point.

Proof.

Let Tij⁢(ti)superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) be the random time taken by client i𝑖iitalic_i in the j𝑗jitalic_j-th attempt of calculating gradient estimator. We have

Tij⁢(ti)={τi+ηij,if⁢ηij≤ti,τi+ti,if⁢ηij>ti.superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖casessubscript𝜏𝑖superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗ifsuperscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖ifsuperscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})=\begin{cases}\tau_{i}+\eta_{i}^{j},&\text{if}\enspace\eta_{i}% ^{j}\leq t_{i},\\ \tau_{i}+t_{i},&\text{if}\enspace\eta_{i}^{j}>t_{i}.\end{cases}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = { start_ROW start_CELL italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . end_CELL end_ROW (10)

Thus, the random time taken for client i𝑖iitalic_i to finish it’s all bisubscript𝑏𝑖b_{i}italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT trials is

𝒯i⁢(ti):=∑j=1biTij⁢(ti)≤bi⁢(τi+ti).assignsubscript𝒯𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝑏𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑏𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖\mathcal{T}_{i}(t_{i}):=\sum_{j=1}^{b_{i}}T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})\leq b_{i}\left(\tau% _{i}+t_{i}\right).caligraphic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) := ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) . (11)

Finally, let 𝒯𝒯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T be the random time required for one iteration of MindFlayer SGD. We get

𝒯=maxi∈[n]⁡𝒯i⁢(ti)≤maxi∈[n]⁡{bi⁢(τi+ti)}.𝒯subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝒯𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝑏𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖\mathcal{T}=\max_{i\in[n]}\mathcal{T}_{i}(t_{i})\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{b_{i}\left% (\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}.caligraphic_T = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } . (12)

It remains to multiply 𝒯𝒯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T with the number of iterations K𝐾Kitalic_K given by Theorem 4.4. ∎

Appendix H Proofs for Heterogeneous Regime

H.1 Proof of Theorem C.1

Here, we rewrite Vecna SGD (Footnote 10) in a classical SGD way.

where pi=F⁢(ti)=P⁢(ηi≤ti)subscript𝑝𝑖𝐹subscript𝑡𝑖𝑃subscript𝜂𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖p_{i}=F(t_{i})=P(\eta_{i}\leq t_{i})italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_F ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_P ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

To prove the theorem we need to establish some properties of the gradient estimator. First, we need an unbiased estimator.

Lemma H.1 (Proof in Section H.1.1).

The gradient estimator in Algorithm 8 given by

g⁢(x):=1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1BiI⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)assign𝑔𝑥1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

is unbiased, i.e., 𝔼⁢[g⁢(x)]=∇f⁢(x)𝔼delimited-[]𝑔𝑥∇𝑓𝑥\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]=\nabla f(x)blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] = ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) for all x∈ℝd𝑥superscriptℝ𝑑x\in\mathbb{R}^{d}italic_x ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Next, we obtain an upper bound for the variance of this estimator.

Lemma H.2 (Proof in Section H.1.2).

The gradient estimator in Algorithm 8 given by

g⁢(x):=1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1BiI⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)assign𝑔𝑥1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

satisfies

𝔼⁢[‖g⁢(x)2‖]≤2⁢(f⁢(x0)−finf)⁢Ln2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi+‖∇f⁢(x)‖2+σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.𝔼delimited-[]norm𝑔superscript𝑥22𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum𝐿superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptnorm∇𝑓𝑥2superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]\leq\frac{2\left(f(x_{0})-f^{% \inf}\right)L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(% x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.blackboard_E [ ∥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ ] ≤ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + ∥ ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

We are ready to prove Theorem C.1. First, let us restate the theorem.

Theorem C.1.

Assume that Assumptions 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function f𝑓fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscript𝑓𝑖f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ]. Let γ=min⁡{1L⁢α⁢K,1L⁢β,ε2⁢L⁢ζ}𝛾1𝐿𝛼𝐾1𝐿𝛽𝜀2𝐿𝜁\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L\beta},\frac{% \varepsilon}{2L\zeta}\right\}italic_γ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_α italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L italic_β end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L italic_ζ end_ARG } in Footnote 10. Then after

K≥12⁢Δ⁢Lε⁢max⁡{β,12⁢Δ⁢αε,2⁢ζε},𝐾12Δ𝐿𝜀𝛽12Δ𝛼𝜀2𝜁𝜀\displaystyle K\geq\frac{12\Delta L}{\varepsilon}\max\left\{\beta,\frac{12% \Delta\alpha}{\varepsilon},\frac{2\zeta}{\varepsilon}\right\},italic_K ≥ divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG roman_max { italic_β , divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_α end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG , divide start_ARG 2 italic_ζ end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG } ,

iterations, the method guarantees that min0≤k≤K⁡𝔼⁢[‖∇f⁢(xk)‖2]≤εsubscript0𝑘𝐾𝔼delimited-[]superscriptnorm∇𝑓superscript𝑥𝑘2𝜀\min_{0\leq k\leq K}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|\nabla f(x^{k})\right\|^{2}\right]\leq\varepsilonroman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 ≤ italic_k ≤ italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E [ ∥ ∇ italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ≤ italic_ε, where Δ=f⁢(x0)−finfΔ𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Δ = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and

α=Ln2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi,β=1,ζ=σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.formulae-sequence𝛼𝐿superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖formulae-sequence𝛽1𝜁superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\beta=1,% \quad\zeta=\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_α = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_β = 1 , italic_ζ = divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .
Proof.

Note that Footnote 10 can be viewed as a special case of classical stochastic gradient descent (SGD), as reformulated in Algorithm 8. We need to verify that the gradient estimator fulfills the conditions required by classical SGD (Theorem E.2). The two preceding lemmas address this requirement precisely. Specifically, Lemma H.1 confirms that the gradient estimator used in Algorithm 8 is unbiased, while Lemma H.2 verifies that the variance of this estimator meets the conditions specified in E.1. Consequently, it remains to apply Theorem E.2. ∎

H.1.1 Proof of Lemma H.1

Lemma H.1.1.

The gradient estimator in Algorithm 8 given by

g⁢(x):=1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1BiI⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)assign𝑔𝑥1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

is unbiased, i.e., 𝔼⁢[g⁢(x)]=∇f⁢(x)𝔼delimited-[]𝑔𝑥∇𝑓𝑥\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]=\nabla f(x)blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] = ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) for all x∈ℝd𝑥superscriptℝ𝑑x\in\mathbb{R}^{d}italic_x ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Proof.

This follows from direct computation:

𝔼⁢[g⁢(x)]𝔼delimited-[]𝑔𝑥\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] =\displaystyle== 𝔼⁢[1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1BiI⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)]𝔼delimited-[]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum% _{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^% {j}\right)\right]blackboard_E [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=\displaystyle== 1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1Bi𝔼⁢[I⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝔼delimited-[]𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}% \mathbb{E}\left[I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i% }^{j}\right)\right]divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=(ηij⟂⟂ξij)\displaystyle\overset{\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\perp\!\!\!\!\perp\xi_{i}^{j}\right)}{=}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⟂ ⟂ italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG = end_ARG 1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1Bi𝔼⁢[I⁢(ηij≤ti)]⁢𝔼⁢[∇fi⁢(x;ξij)]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝔼delimited-[]𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖𝔼delimited-[]∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}% \mathbb{E}\left[I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\right]\mathbb{E}\left[% \nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right]divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] blackboard_E [ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=\displaystyle== 1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1Bipi⁢∇fi⁢(x)1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}p_% {i}\nabla f_{i}(x)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x )
=\displaystyle== 1n⁢∑i=1n∇fi⁢(x)1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\nabla f_{i}(x)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x )
=\displaystyle== ∇f⁢(x).∇𝑓𝑥\displaystyle\nabla f(x).∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) .

∎

H.1.2 Proof of Lemma H.2

Lemma H.2.

The gradient estimator in Algorithm 8 given by

g⁢(x):=1n⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢∑j=1BiI⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)assign𝑔𝑥1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

satisfies

𝔼⁢[‖g⁢(x)2‖]≤2⁢L⁢(f⁢(x0)−finf)n2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi+‖∇f⁢(x)‖2+σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.𝔼delimited-[]norm𝑔superscript𝑥22𝐿𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimumsuperscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptnorm∇𝑓𝑥2superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]\leq\frac{2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{% \inf}\right)}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(x% )\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.blackboard_E [ ∥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ ] ≤ divide start_ARG 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + ∥ ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .
Proof.

Since ηijsuperscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗\eta_{i}^{j}italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and ξijsuperscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\xi_{i}^{j}italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT are independent from each other for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] and j𝑗jitalic_j, we have

Var⁢(g⁢(x))Var𝑔𝑥\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) =\displaystyle== 1n2⁢∑i=1n1pi2⁢Bi2⁢∑j=1BiVar⁢(I⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij)),1superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1superscriptsubscript𝑝𝑖2superscriptsubscript𝐵𝑖2superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖Var𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}^{2}B_{i}^{2}}\sum_{j=% 1}^{B_{i}}\mathrm{Var}\left(I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}% \left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right),divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Var ( italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ,

then we use the fact that

Var⁢(X⁢Y)=Var⁢(X)⁢Var⁢(Y)+Var⁢(X)⁢𝔼⁢[Y]2+Var⁢(Y)⁢𝔼⁢[X]2,Var𝑋𝑌Var𝑋Var𝑌Var𝑋𝔼superscriptdelimited-[]𝑌2Var𝑌𝔼superscriptdelimited-[]𝑋2\mathrm{Var}\left(XY\right)=\mathrm{Var}\left(X\right)\mathrm{Var}\left(Y% \right)+\mathrm{Var}\left(X\right)\mathbb{E}\left[Y\right]^{2}+\mathrm{Var}% \left(Y\right)\mathbb{E}\left[X\right]^{2},roman_Var ( italic_X italic_Y ) = roman_Var ( italic_X ) roman_Var ( italic_Y ) + roman_Var ( italic_X ) blackboard_E [ italic_Y ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + roman_Var ( italic_Y ) blackboard_E [ italic_X ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where X𝑋Xitalic_X and Y𝑌Yitalic_Y are independent random variables. Hence, we obtain the following bound on the variance

Var⁢(I⁢(ηij≤ti)⁢∇fi⁢(x;ξij))Var𝐼superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥superscriptsubscript𝜉𝑖𝑗\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i% }\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right)roman_Var ( italic_I ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ≤\displaystyle\leq≤ pi⁢(1−pi)⁢σ2+pi⁢(1−pi)⁢‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2+σ2⁢pi2subscript𝑝𝑖1subscript𝑝𝑖superscript𝜎2subscript𝑝𝑖1subscript𝑝𝑖superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥2superscript𝜎2superscriptsubscript𝑝𝑖2\displaystyle p_{i}(1-p_{i})\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f% _{i}(x)\right\|^{2}+\sigma^{2}p_{i}^{2}italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== pi⁢σ2+pi⁢(1−pi)⁢‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2.subscript𝑝𝑖superscript𝜎2subscript𝑝𝑖1subscript𝑝𝑖superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥2\displaystyle p_{i}\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)% \right\|^{2}.italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

As a result, the variance of g⁢(x)𝑔𝑥g(x)italic_g ( italic_x ) is bounded by

Var⁢(g⁢(x))Var𝑔𝑥\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) ≤\displaystyle\leq≤ 1n2⁢∑i=1n1pi2⁢Bi2⁢∑j=1Bi(pi⁢σ2+pi⁢(1−pi)⁢‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2)1superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1superscriptsubscript𝑝𝑖2superscriptsubscript𝐵𝑖2superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖superscript𝜎2subscript𝑝𝑖1subscript𝑝𝑖superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}^{2}B_{i}^{2}}\sum_{j=% 1}^{B_{i}}\left(p_{i}\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x% )\right\|^{2}\right)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== 1n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi⁢(σ2+(1−pi)⁢‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2).1superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscript𝜎21subscript𝑝𝑖superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\left(\sigma^{2}% +\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}\right).divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Finally

𝔼⁢[‖g⁢(x)2‖]𝔼delimited-[]norm𝑔superscript𝑥2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]blackboard_E [ ∥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ ] =\displaystyle== Var⁢(g⁢(x))+‖𝔼⁢[g⁢(x)]‖2Var𝑔𝑥superscriptnorm𝔼delimited-[]𝑔𝑥2\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)+\|\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]\|^{2}roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) + ∥ blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤absent\displaystyle\overset{\leq}{}over≤ start_ARG end_ARG ‖∇f⁢(x)‖2+1n2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi⁢‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2+σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.superscriptnorm∇𝑓𝑥21superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥2superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\displaystyle\left\|\nabla f(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac% {1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2% }}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.∥ ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Next we use ‖∇fi⁢(x)‖2≤2⁢L⁢(f⁢(x0)−finf)superscriptnorm∇subscript𝑓𝑖𝑥22𝐿𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}\leq 2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}\right)∥ ∇ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ), thus

𝔼⁢[‖g⁢(x)2‖]𝔼delimited-[]norm𝑔superscript𝑥2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]blackboard_E [ ∥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ ] ≤\displaystyle\leq≤ 2⁢L⁢(f⁢(x0)−finf)n2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi+‖∇f⁢(x)‖2+σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.2𝐿𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimumsuperscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptnorm∇𝑓𝑥2superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\displaystyle\frac{2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}\right)}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac% {1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}% \sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.divide start_ARG 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + ∥ ∇ italic_f ( italic_x ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

∎

H.2 Proof of Theorem C.2

The following lemma gives time complexity for any choice of B1,…,Bnsubscript𝐵1…subscript𝐵𝑛B_{1},\ldots,B_{n}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and t=(t1,…,tn)𝑡subscript𝑡1…subscript𝑡𝑛t=\left(t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\right)italic_t = ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) in Vecna SGD.

Lemma H.3 (Proof in Section H.2.1).

Assume that Assumptions 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function f𝑓fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscript𝑓𝑖f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ]. Let γ=min⁡{1L⁢α⁢K,1L,ε2⁢L⁢ζ}𝛾1𝐿𝛼𝐾1𝐿𝜀2𝐿𝜁\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L},\frac{\varepsilon}{2L% \zeta}\right\}italic_γ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_α italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L italic_ζ end_ARG } in Footnote 10. Then after

T𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)≥maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}⁢12⁢Δ⁢Lε⁢max⁡{1,12⁢Δ⁢αε,2⁢ζε}subscript𝑇𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖12Δ𝐿𝜀112Δ𝛼𝜀2𝜁𝜀T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}VecnaSGD}}}(t)\geq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}% \left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\frac{12\Delta L}{\varepsilon}\max\left\{1,\frac{% 12\Delta\alpha}{\varepsilon},\frac{2\zeta}{\varepsilon}\right\}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_VecnaSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_α end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG , divide start_ARG 2 italic_ζ end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG }

seconds, where the method guarantees to find an ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ-stationary point, where Δ=f⁢(x0)−finfΔ𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Δ = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and

α=Ln2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi,ζ=σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.formulae-sequence𝛼𝐿superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖𝜁superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\zeta=% \frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_α = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_ζ = divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Now we are ready to prove the theorem.

Theorem C.2.

Assume that Assumptions 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function f𝑓fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscript𝑓𝑖f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ]. Let γ=min⁡{1L⁢α⁢K,1L,ε2⁢L}𝛾1𝐿𝛼𝐾1𝐿𝜀2𝐿\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L},\frac{\varepsilon}{2L% }\right\}italic_γ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_α italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG } in Footnote 10, where

α=Ln2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi,ζ=σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.formulae-sequence𝛼𝐿superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖𝜁superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\zeta=% \frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_α = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_ζ = divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Let t=(t1,…,tn)𝑡subscript𝑡1…subscript𝑡𝑛t=\left(t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\right)italic_t = ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), t1,…,tn≥0subscript𝑡1…subscript𝑡𝑛0t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\geq 0italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ 0. Without loss of generality assume that 0<τ1+t1≤⋯≤τn+tn0subscript𝜏1subscript𝑡1⋯subscript𝜏𝑛subscript𝑡𝑛0<\tau_{1}+t_{1}\leq\cdots\leq\tau_{n}+t_{n}0 < italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ⋯ ≤ italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Let

T=τn+tn+[1n⁢∑i=1nτi+tipi]⁢σ2n⁢ε+[1n⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢(τi+ti)]⁢Δ⁢Ln⁢ε,𝑇subscript𝜏𝑛subscript𝑡𝑛delimited-[]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖superscript𝜎2𝑛𝜀delimited-[]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖Δ𝐿𝑛𝜀T=\tau_{n}+t_{n}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{\tau_{i}+t_{i}}{p_{i}}% \right]\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n\varepsilon}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-% p_{i}}{p_{i}}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\right]\frac{\Delta L}{n\varepsilon},italic_T = italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ] divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_ε end_ARG + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] divide start_ARG roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_ε end_ARG ,

where Δ=f⁢(x0)−finfΔ𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Δ = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Put

Bi=⌈bi⌉,bi=Tτi+ti.formulae-sequencesubscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝑏𝑖subscript𝑏𝑖𝑇subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖B_{i}=\lceil b_{i}\rceil,\quad b_{i}=\frac{T}{\tau_{i}+t_{i}}.italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ⌈ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⌉ , italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Then, Vecna SGD guarantees to find an ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ-stationary point after

T𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)≥288×Δ⁢Lε⁢(τn+tn+[1n⁢∑i=1nτi+tipi]⁢σ2n⁢ε+[1n⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢(τi+ti)]⁢Δ⁢Ln⁢ε)subscript𝑇𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡288Δ𝐿𝜀subscript𝜏𝑛subscript𝑡𝑛delimited-[]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖superscript𝜎2𝑛𝜀delimited-[]1𝑛superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖Δ𝐿𝑛𝜀T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}VecnaSGD}}}(t)\geq 288\times\frac{\Delta L% }{\varepsilon}\left(\tau_{n}+t_{n}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{\tau_{% i}+t_{i}}{p_{i}}\right]\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n\varepsilon}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{% i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\right]\frac{\Delta L}% {n\varepsilon}\right)italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_VecnaSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥ 288 × divide start_ARG roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ] divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_ε end_ARG + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] divide start_ARG roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_ε end_ARG )

seconds.

Proof.

Since we have bi≥1subscript𝑏𝑖1b_{i}\geq 1italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ 1 for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ], we get

maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}≤maxi∈[n]⁡{(bi+1)⁢(τi+ti)}≤2⁢maxi∈[n]⁡{bi⁢(τi+ti)}=2⁢T.subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝑏𝑖1subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖2subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝑏𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖2𝑇\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{\left(b_% {i}+1\right)\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\leq 2\max_{i\in[n]}\{b_{i}\left(\tau% _{i}+t_{i}\right)\}=2T.roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } ≤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { ( italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 ) ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } ≤ 2 roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = 2 italic_T .

It remains to apply Lemma H.3. We get

and

H.2.1 Proof of Lemma H.3

Lemma H.3.

Assume that Assumptions 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function f𝑓fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscript𝑓𝑖f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i∈[n]𝑖delimited-[]𝑛i\in[n]italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ]. Let γ=min⁡{1L⁢α⁢K,1L,ε2⁢L⁢ζ}𝛾1𝐿𝛼𝐾1𝐿𝜀2𝐿𝜁\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L},\frac{\varepsilon}{2L% \zeta}\right\}italic_γ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_α italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L italic_ζ end_ARG } in Footnote 10. Then after

T𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣⁢(t)≥maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}⁢12⁢Δ⁢Lε⁢max⁡{1,12⁢Δ⁢αε,2⁢ζε}subscript𝑇𝖵𝖾𝖼𝗇𝖺𝖲𝖦𝖣𝑡subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖12Δ𝐿𝜀112Δ𝛼𝜀2𝜁𝜀T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}VecnaSGD}}}(t)\geq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}% \left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\frac{12\Delta L}{\varepsilon}\max\left\{1,\frac{% 12\Delta\alpha}{\varepsilon},\frac{2\zeta}{\varepsilon}\right\}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_VecnaSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ≥ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG 12 roman_Δ italic_α end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG , divide start_ARG 2 italic_ζ end_ARG start_ARG italic_ε end_ARG }

seconds, where the method guarantees to find an ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ-stationary point, where Δ=f⁢(x0)−finfΔ𝑓subscript𝑥0superscript𝑓infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Δ = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and

α=Ln2⁢∑i=1n1−pipi⁢Bi,ζ=σ2n2⁢∑i=1n1pi⁢Bi.formulae-sequence𝛼𝐿superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖𝜁superscript𝜎2superscript𝑛2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑛1subscript𝑝𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\zeta=% \frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_α = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_ζ = divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .
Proof.

Let Tij⁢(ti)superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) be the random time taken by client i𝑖iitalic_i in the j𝑗jitalic_j-th attempt of calculating gradient estimator. We have

Tij⁢(ti)={τi+ηij,if⁢ηij≤ti,τi+ti,if⁢ηij>ti.superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖casessubscript𝜏𝑖superscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗ifsuperscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖ifsuperscriptsubscript𝜂𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})=\begin{cases}\tau_{i}+\eta_{i}^{j},&\text{if}\enspace\eta_{i}% ^{j}\leq t_{i},\\ \tau_{i}+t_{i},&\text{if}\enspace\eta_{i}^{j}>t_{i}.\end{cases}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = { start_ROW start_CELL italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . end_CELL end_ROW (13)

Thus, the random time taken for client i𝑖iitalic_i to finish it’s all Bisubscript𝐵𝑖B_{i}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT trials is

𝒯i⁢(ti):=∑j=1BiTij⁢(ti)≤Bi⁢(τi+ti).assignsubscript𝒯𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑗1subscript𝐵𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑇𝑖𝑗subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖\mathcal{T}_{i}(t_{i}):=\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}T_{i}^{j}(t_{i})\leq B_{i}\left(\tau% _{i}+t_{i}\right).caligraphic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) := ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) . (14)

Finally, let 𝒯𝒯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T be the random time required for one iteration of Vecna SGD. We get

𝒯=maxi∈[n]⁡𝒯i⁢(ti)≤maxi∈[n]⁡{Bi⁢(τi+ti)}.𝒯subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝒯𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖subscript𝑖delimited-[]𝑛subscript𝐵𝑖subscript𝜏𝑖subscript𝑡𝑖\mathcal{T}=\max_{i\in[n]}\mathcal{T}_{i}(t_{i})\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}\left% (\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}.caligraphic_T = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ∈ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } . (15)

It remains to multiply 𝒯𝒯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T with the number of iterations K𝐾Kitalic_K given by Theorem C.1. ∎
